pr_title: Update DeleteTest to be more self-contained

timeline.message:
Update DeleteTest to be more self-contained

Previously, this test was over-zealously deleting Observations it didn't
create.
Now it should be much more self-contained and more consistent: it always
tests both multi-delete scenarios (result <= max & result > max).

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>
